name: remind
description: Create a reminder to be sent to you in the near future.

options.name: time
options.description: The time until this reminder should be sent. Examples: 2m or 6h or 1w

options.name: message
options.description: What you would like to be reminded about.

options.name: dm
options.description: If you would like this reminder sent via DM rather than in this channel.
